name: Calling Bot
desc: An intelligent voice-enabled shopping mall assistant that helps customers find products, store locations, and mall information using natural language processing and SQL database queries.

name: Car Price Prediction App
desc: Built and deployed a predictive model with Flask for real-time insights, demonstrating my skills in data scraping, analysis, and deployment.

name: Caesar Cipher Encryption Tool
desc: I created a Tkinter GUI to encrypt and decrypt messages using the Caesar Cipher. This was a great GUI development exercise.

name: WhatsApp Chat Analysis Tool
desc: I developed a tool that turns your WhatsApp chat data into valuable insights. You can: Discover peak messaging hours, Track message frequency.

name: Intrusion Detection System
desc: Developed a high-performance IDS through data collection, preprocessing, and advanced feature engineering techniques.
